deals.name: A Godzilla garden gnome
deals.description: Let those pesky, roving neighborhood gnomes know where they're not welcome. (A series of big-budget, narratively lackluster sequels not included.)

deals.name: A desktop refrigerator
deals.description: Now when you say you need a cold one, you can mean it literally, with one (1) single refrigerated beverage at your fingertips.

deals.name: A suture practice kit
deals.description: Not quite a game, not quite medical school, this suture training kit will have you fixing up wounds and repairing hems with ease.

deals.name: Dill pickle lip balm
deals.description: Some people want their mouths to be minty fresh, or sweetly scented. And others just want their lips to have the distinct flavor of something that might accompany a pastrami sandwich.

deals.name: A pizza hat
deals.description: Finally, you can indulge in everyone's life-long desire of wearing pizza atop their head. Beware the sprinkled parmesan as you nod or shake your head, thoughâ€”some might mistake it for dandruff.
